text: دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ فِيهَا سُبۡحَٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٞۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: Their call therein will be, "Exalted are You, O Allah," and their greeting therein will be, "Peace." And the last of their call will be, "Praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds
translation.id: Doa mereka di dalamnya ialah, "Subḥānakallāhumma" (Mahasuci Engkau, ya Tuhan kami), dan salam penghormatan mereka ialah, "Salām" (salam sejahtera). Dan penutup doa mereka ialah, "Al-Ḥamdu lillāhi Rabbil 'ālamīn". (segala puji bagi Allah Tuhan seluruh alam)
